issues.description: The problem description text specifies messageOnMilk(double milkVolume) with a double parameter, but the UML/interface and all template/solution code define messageOnMilk() with no parameters. This mismatch will confuse students about the correct method signature and prevent compilation if they follow the text.
issues.suggested_fix: Align the textual specification with the UML and code: change the description to refer to messageOnMilk() with no parameters, or update the interface and all implementations to messageOnMilk(double milkVolume) consistently.
